name: openclaw
description: Deploy and configure OpenClaw AI gateway on KASM workspaces or standalone Docker. Multi-provider LLM routing (Anthropic, OpenAI, Gemini, Groq, Bedrock) with multi-channel messaging (WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord, Slack). Covers Docker deployment, security hardening, persistent storage, browser sidecar, and webhook automation. Use when: deploying OpenClaw, configuring AI gateway channels, setting up openclaw container on KASM, troubleshooting token mismatch or EACCES errors, or securing gateway bin
